If you're missing a .dll, it's because your antivirus deleted it. Just google the DLL and you can find a download link for pretty much any of them.

binkw32.dll problem has got to do with directx update that you need to get. BTW, does anyone have this problem where Vito's weapon keeps changing to his hands?

http://www.directxupdate.com/
Its weird that a windows update could ever fix anything, but this one does.... just make sure it installs the latest redistributables; I fixed my computer with an installer from a different source, which I unfortunately cannot find at the moment.... this should work, though.
BTW the Binkw32.dll error might show up on computers with bad graphics - make sure you have proper specs.
